identified-content.object.title: New York Times Reporting: Arctic Rush (Tv Program)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Media, Entertainment and Publishing

abstract.p: Discovery Times Channel will air documentary New York Times Reporting: Arctic Rush (S)

block.p: NEW YORK TIMES REPORTING: ARCTIC RUSH Discovery Times Channel, tonight at 10

As scientists predict an iceless Arctic Ocean, at least in summer, within this century, countries and companies are girding for the advent of potential new shipping routes, oil and gas exploration and even disputes over national borders. And the people who live in the Arctic fear their livelihoods and traditions will disappear with the ice. Four reporters from The New York Times and a television team from The Times produced this one-hour documentary exploring the boons and perils of climate change in some of the world's coldest places.
Four reporters and a television team from The Times produced this documentary exploring the perils of climate change in some of the world's coldest places.
